          <title>
            <string language="sl">Obisk kraja (Slovenija)</string>
            <string language="en">Visiting the place (Slovenia)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Besichtigen des Platzes (Slowenien)</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci individualno rešujejo učni list. Nato imamo priložnost, da po poročanju sprožimo razpravo o posameznem problemu, ki smo ga želeli obravnavati.</string>
            <string language="en">Describing the place that we visited (find on map, draw roads, ...).</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>

Karte, Betragstraßen...). besichtigten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrivant l'endroit que nous avons visité 
(trouvaille sur la carte, les routes d'aspiration...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrevendo o lugar que nós visitamos (achado no

          </description>

χάρτη, σύρει τους δρόμους...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Describiendo el lugar que visitamos (hallazgo en 
correspondencia, los caminos del drenaje...).</string>
